description: This file sets up an asynchronous agent using the 'Agent' class with a specific 'OllamaTools' model, and runs an asynchronous response printing method for a given prompt.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent capable of running prompts and handling responses.

classes.name: RunResponseEvent
classes.description: Represents an event containing a response chunk from the agent.

classes.name: OllamaTools
classes.description: Model class for Ollama tools used by the agent.

methods.name: agent.run
methods.description: Executes a prompt and returns an iterator over response events.

methods.name: agent.aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously prints the response for a given prompt.
